losing the race to be fit. centre Ryan Cross , flanker George Smith , lock Nathan Sharpe , prop Al Baxter and hooker Steve Moore all return to the run-on side after the record 53-8 loss to the springboks in johannesburg. Ryan Cross won no 13 jersey, which he wore for the first time against the all blacks in sydney in july, after first choice midfielder Berrick Barnes was ruled out with a shoulder injury. it meant a midfield reshuffle and positional switch for captain Stirling Mortlock to second five-eighth to accommodate Ryan Cross . Timana Tahu , who wore the no 12 jersey in johannesburg, paid the price and missed the squad altogether.
